title: What's the best way to go about getting a girlfriend as a high school senior? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best way is to talk to girls. Get to know them better. Go to socials, dances, spirit events, etc, and meet as many people as possible. Talk to them; be cool and stay confident. If you find somebody you would like to know even better (*wink wink*), ask them on a date. This could be as simple as taking her downtown or to a snack shop after school, or as formal as getting dinner with her at a sit-down restaurant. Do not fear rejection. The worst thing that could happen is that she could say no. If that’s the case, move on and don’t linger. In the end, the best way to try to get a girlfriend (nothing can be guaranteed) is to put yourself out there in the social scene. You don’t have to be popular, you don’t have to be athletic, heck you don’t even have to be the most suave person in the school. You just have to TALK, GET TO KNOW BETTER, then ASK ON A DATE. If the first date is successful, tell her you would like to hang out again. And again and again. Now this is where the word “dating” comes from. I hope this helps. P.S: Getting a girlfriend senior year is not the most advisable thing to do. For the first semester, you will be bogged down with academics, extracurricular activities, and college applications. The best thing to do would be to wait until you go to university. That way, you have more girls to pick from (more fish in the sea) AND you have a more flexible schedule that allows you to have time to date (more freedom in college).
